column4: where are modules being called? /etc/modules.conf does not exist.... like in gentoo i need to pass some options to a module but putting it in /etc/modules doesn't seem to be doing anything =(
I added "options bttv tuner=2 card=64 automute=0" to the modules file, can you think of any reason this isn't working.... tuner=2 sets it to NTSC instead of pal....
